name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose Remove Module
title: Propose removing a module
description: Create a proposal to remove a module from the MultiSig wallet. This disables the module's functionality. The proposal requires quorum approval before the module is removed.

inputs.name: Module Address
inputs.description: The address of the smart contract module to remove.

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The proposal to remove a module is now awaiting signatures.

label.en: Get notified when this proposal is signed
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird

body.en: A board member has signed proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} to remove a module
body.de: Ein Vorstandsmitglied hat Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} zur Entfernung eines Moduls unterzeichnet
